title: How to Make Broad Bean Pate

steps.headline: Place in pot with water to cover.
Add to a blender or food processor.
Remove using a spoon or spatula.
Chill for at least a half hour in the fridge.
steps.description: Cover with clingfilm to protect it from fridge odors.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Serve with raw vegetables, crackers, and toasted bread fingers.

text: Shell the broad beans.  Place in pot with water to cover. Cook until tender. Drain. Leave to cool until warm. Add to a blender or food processor. Pour in the remaining ingredients. Blend all ingredients together.  Remove using a spoon or spatula. Pack into a serving bowl. Chill for at least a half hour in the fridge. Cover with clingfilm to protect it from fridge odors. Serve. Serve with raw vegetables, crackers, and toasted bread fingers.
